title: iframe Restyle
description: Message from a UI iframe to the DA proxy code (setup by `getAgent()`) with updated styling information to apply to the iframe. Can be used to implement a pop-open or close interaction or other transition needed by a UI implementation.

updatedCSS.title: Updated CSS
updatedCSS.description: A constrained set of CSS properties that should be applied to the iframe. Note `position` cannot be set, and should always be `fixed`.

height.title: height
height.description: The updated height of the iframe

width.title: width
width.description: The updated width of the iframe

zIndex.title: zIndex
zIndex.description: The updated zindex to apply to the iframe

left.title: left
left.description: The initial left property to apply to the iframe

top.title: top
top.description: The initial top property to apply to the iframe

bottom.title: left
bottom.description: The initial bottom property to apply to the iframe

right.title: top
right.description: The initial right property to apply to the iframe

transition.title: transition
transition.description: The updated transition property to apply to the iframe

maxHeight.title: maxHeight
maxHeight.description: The updated maximum height to apply to the iframe

maxWidth.title: maxWidth
maxWidth.description: The updated maximum with to apply to the iframe
